title: Privacy Policy
overview_text: This document explains how we handle your personal information when you use our services. "Personal information" means any details that could be used to identify you. This policy doesn't cover the practices of companies we don't control or people outside our organization.
types_data_heading: Types of Personal Data We Collect (and Why)
types_data_summary: Here's a summary of the personal information we've collected over the past 12 months, along with the reasons why, and how we use it:
customer_info_text1: We need your name, contact details, and address to manage your account and deliver our services (like shipping products, sending updates, and handling any legally required aspects).
customer_info_text2: We also use this information to improve our services, and for targeted marketing with your permission.
customer_info_text3: We'll use your email to share news about our products, app updates, and relevant webinars.
usage_data_text: We collect information about how you interact with our services, including pages visited, features used, and time spent on different sections. This helps us improve our platform and provide better user experiences.
technical_info_text: We automatically collect certain technical information when you use our services, such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and operating system. This information helps us ensure our services work properly and securely.
how_we_use_intro: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
use_purpose_1: To provide and maintain our services
use_purpose_2: To process transactions and send related information
use_purpose_3: To send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
use_purpose_4: To respond to your comments, questions, and requests
use_purpose_5: To monitor and analyze trends and usage patterns
use_purpose_6: To personalize and improve our services
info_sharing_intro: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:
sharing_circumstance_1: With service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
sharing_circumstance_2: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
sharing_circumstance_3: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
data_security_text: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
your_rights_intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
right_1: The right to access your personal information
right_2: The right to correct inaccurate information
right_3: The right to delete your personal information
right_4: The right to restrict processing of your information

changes_policy_text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date.
